1.0.name: wordpress/documents-shortcode
1.0.description: By adding a simple [documents] shortcode in your post or page, you get a list of all documents (non-image/audio/video) attached. Each item in the document list can be styled with CSS to indicate different document types based on file extension (e.g., .doc, .pdf, etc).
